thread.title: 18 Things Everyone Obsessed With Soup Dumplings Knows To Be True
thread.title_full: 18 Things Everyone Obsessed With Soup Dumplings Knows To Be True

author: Crystal Ro
title: 18 Things Everyone Obsessed With Soup Dumplings Knows To Be True
text:
View this image ›
emm.yee / Via instagram.com ID: 10348867 2. Because the first time you bit into one of these soup-filled delights, you were like, “WHAT HAVE I BEEN MISSING MY ENTIRE LIFE?!” View this image ›
indica.queen / Via instagram.com ID: 10348882 3. Seriously, you probably had one and then said, “Okay, I need to order like fifty more of these.” View this image ›
bestfoodseattle / Via instagram.com ID: 10348890 4. And it was also at that moment you realized xiaolongbao is the king of Chinese buns. View this image ›
jshakes1 / Via instagram.com ID: 10348896 5. You’ve been known to order A LOT of xiaolongbao in just one sitting. View this image ›
kittykatofdoom / Via instagram.com ID: 10348898 6. And you totally think it’s worth the ~extra wait~ for the perfect XLB. View this image ›
takes2tospoon / Via instagram.com ID: 10348909 7. The anticipation of xiaolongbao exploding juicy goodness in your mouth almost always kills you. View this image ›
_yuriiii__ / Via instagram.com ID: 10348923 8. And sometimes you just like to stab it open a) to watch the soup drip out and b) to cool it down. View this image ›
m1ki_ / Via instagram.com ID: 10348925 9. You’ve definitely thought, “WORTH IT,” after burning your mouth eating a soup dumpling. View this image ›
beancurdgirleats / Via instagram.com ID: 10348928 10. And sometimes you feel like you’re just in your own ~world~ when eating your beloved soup dumplings. View this image ›
jdmhongkong / Via instagram.com ID: 10348944 11. You basically lost your mind the first time you saw a big-ass SUPER xiaolongbao. View this image ›
miss_foodie_au / Via instagram.com ID: 10348931 12. In fact, you probably looked at it and thought, “OMG, where do I begin?!” View this image ›
cxjacob / Via instagram.com ID: 10348930 13. You’re pretty much down to try any variation of XLB. View this image ›
armis_88 / Via instagram.com ID: 10348933 14. Even ones that come in ~questionable~ colors. View this image ›
paradisedynastyph / Via instagram.com ID: 10348935 15. You legitimately love watching the dumplings be made. View this image ›
FoodWineDine / Via youtube.com ID: 10348949 16. You’re so desperate for soup dumplings 24/7 that you’ve dared to actually buy frozen ones. View this image ›
tiffett / Via instagram.com ID: 10349173 17. Although, you know, deep down, that it’s NOT the same as THIS: View this image ›
savorysweetlive / Via instagram.com ID: 10349175 18. Because if there’s one food that you could eat for the rest of your life… View this image ›
actually_andy / Via instagram.com ID: 10349286 …it would be soup dumplings. View this image ›
kevheadr / Via instagram.com ID: 10349289
